attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chavs are over-running the county. these animals had bread like rabbits in the last decade and are damaging to our country and society. Since the 2nd of January 2001 the average IQ of people in the UK has fallen to 50, this is in conjunction with the rising pepulation of Chavs in the UK, therefore chavs are to blame. Chavs are also the cause of most crimes in the uk: Underage drinking, Underage smoking, Undearge sex, prostitution, theft, murder, GBH etc.....

so all in all it makes sence to allow everyone to Kill chavs.

you know it makes sense,

yours thankfully

TEH INTERNETZ

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
